thread.title_full: Russia: Information that a Ukrainian unmanned vessel hit the Zaporizhia nuclear power plant – 2024-09-26 20:43:29

author: world today news
title: Russia: Information that a Ukrainian unmanned vessel hit the Zaporizhia nuclear power plant – 2024-09-26 20:43:29
text:
Russia’s emergency service said a Ukrainian drone dropped a munition on the territory of the Zaporizhia nuclear power plant today although there was no damage, state news agency RIA reported, citing local emergency services.
Reuters was unable to confirm the report.
The Zaporizhia nuclear power plant, the largest in Europe, has been under the control of Russian forces since March 2022, and is close to the front line between the two sides.
